data.data: Initial comments:This report is the result of an unannounced offsite revisit survey initiated on January 16, 2024, and completed on January 18, 2024, following an unannounced complaint investigation (CHL23C555V) initiated offsite on August 16, 2023, and completed offsite on September 14, 2023, at Good Shepherd Specialty Hospital.  It was determined that the facility was in compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is the result of an unannounced offsite revisit survey initiated on January 16, 2024, and completed on January 18, 2024, following an unannounced complaint investigation (CHL23C555V) initiated offsite on August 16, 2023, and completed offsite on September 14, 2023, at Good Shepherd Specialty Hospital.  It was determined that the facility was in compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction:

Initial comments:This report is the result of an unannounced on-site special monitoring survey completed on December 14, 2023, at Good Shepherd Specialty Hospital.  It was determined the facility was in compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is the result of an unannounced on-site special monitoring survey completed on December 14, 2023, at Good Shepherd Specialty Hospital.  It was determined the facility was in compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction:

Initial comments:This report is the result of an unannounced onsite complaint investigation CHL23C519V initiated on September 27, 2023 and completed on September 29, 2023, at Good Shepherd Specialty Hospital. Initial comments:This report is for replacement equipment, B. Braun Perfusor Space Syringe Pumps, beginning on May 24, 2023. Good Shepherd Specialty Hospital attested they were in full compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is for replacement equipment, B.
